summary:
Falari
--------------------------------------------
Height 0.97 Weight 0
Location: Winterhold The Frozen Hearth
Default Outfit: College Robes
Combat style: Destruction Magic, fire of mage
Spell: Firebolt, Incinerate, Flame Cloak
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/9brdKze.jpg[/img][/center]
Hello! My name is YuiH, I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English.

*This mod is stand-alone follower, so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

Fallout4 is about to come out, so I think it's time for ok to re-upload some of my old characters,
[color=#ffff00]I just do it for people who want it, so I don't care any [/color][color=#ffff00]criticize and hating comments.
[/color]
[b][color=#ffff00]Like it, download it. Don't like it? please just leave.[/color]

[b][color=#cc0000][size=5][Character][/size][/color][/b][/b]
[color=#e06666][size=4][b]Falari
[/b][/size][/color]Height 0.97 Weight 0 UNPB
[b]Location: [/b]Winterhold The Frozen Hearth
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] College Robes
[b]Weapon: [/b]No
[b]Combat style: [/b]Destruction Magic, fire of mage
[b]Spell: [/b]Firebolt, Incinerate, Flame Cloak
[b]Perk: [/b]Expert Destruction, Augmented Flames, Impact, Intense Flames

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:
[/b][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]Her face base is Ciceria, a little bit wild but not crazy, kinda quick work, don't take much time, so maybe still need revise.
I image She is a arrogant girl ( Tsundere? ), so I make her mouth a little bit different, hope that will make her a little more unique.
When I create her, I image she is a talent fire mage, heard about The College Of Winterhold so she went to the Skyrim and dmission to the college,
but she really can't stand of the cold weather of Skyrim, so she quit and decide leaving the Skyrim,
but she find out she spend most of her money on college, so she stuck in the Frozen Hearth.
After create the Sha, I always wanna create another mage, and no area spell this time,
and I t[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]hought about "Conjure Flame Atronach" spell but, seem Flame Atronach will explode when they die,
I hate that, because I will got damage because of that, so I didn't give her that spell, so she just sample a fire ball machine gun.[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------




[color=#ff0000][size=5][b][Recommended mod][/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][b][Credits][/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
MissAniThrope's C Eyes Reboot - Complete
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only
And author of the original creator of the original Mod by Ren, apachii, PeggyZone, NewSeaSims, Nani0427
author: YuiH
